attributes.action: Hold UK government national enquiry into grooming gangs and investigations.
attributes.additional_details: It seems that singular party decision is not available to make enquiry appropriate over all services involved as above.
attributes.background: Investigate circumstances of reported grooming gangs such as Oldham and Rochdale. How they were handled by police, local services, Crown prosecution service and successive uk governments.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
